resources.string:
This application sends and receives geo-tagged SMSes using the GeoSMS standard. For more information, visit http://geosms.wordpress.com 

Written in 2010 by Matthew Kwan, a PhD Candidate in Geospatial Sciences at RMIT University's School of Mathematical and Geospatial Sciences, Melbourne, Australia. 

This application is licensed under version 2.0 of the Apache Licence. 

Visit RMIT's mobile web site www.rmit.edu.au/mobile for other mobile apps, study options, news, and the latest RMIT YouTube videos, tweets, and flickr images.
